remarks: A fully faithful functor reflects isomorphisms.  Corollary 3.32 of [Adamek] p. 35.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fthmon.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
fthmon.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
fthmon.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( C Faith D ) G ) $.
fthmon.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
fthmon.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
fthmon.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( X H Y ) ) $.
ffthiso.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( C Full D ) G ) $.
ffthiso.s $e |- I = ( Iso ` C ) $.
ffthiso.t $e |- J = ( Iso ` D ) $.
ffthiso $p |- ( ph -> ( R e. ( X I Y ) <-> ( ( X G Y ) ` R ) e. ( ( F ` X ) J ( F ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
